name: King Of Parking
description:
King Of Parking -  is a kind of super addictive puzzle game. You should try to open up your mind and find a way to get out the red car from the board, other cars can be moved vertically or horizontally. The exit will always be changing, so you really need to focus your minds on every single puzzle. 

HOW TO PLAY
😃 Need to move the red car to the exit.
😃Horizontal cars can be moved from side to side
😃 Vertical cars can be moved up and down
😃 Use HINT, solve puzzle.
